title: CreateClientCenterClientRequest
description: Create Client Center client entity request

clientCenter.description: FullyQualifiedName of the Client Center that this client is part of.

parent.description: Fully qualified name of  the parent Client Center client.

name.description: Preferred name for the Client Center client.

displayName.description: Display Name that identifies this Client Center client.

description.description: Description of the Client Center client.

synonyms.description: Alternate names that are synonyms or near-synonyms for the Client Center client.

relatedClients.description: Other array of Client Center client fully qualified names that are related to this Client Center client.

references.description: Link to a reference from an external Client Center.

reviewers.description: User names of the reviewers for this Client Center.

owner.description: Owner of this Client Center client.

tags.description: Tags for this Client Center client.

mutuallyExclusive.description: Client Center clients that are children of this client are mutually exclusive. When mutually exclusive is `true` only one client can be used to label an entity from this group. When mutually exclusive is `false`, multiple clients from this group can be used to label an entity.

extension.description: Entity extension data with custom attributes added to the entity.
